column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had ordered a dozen oysters
column2: they had 4 kinds & we tried 3. We ordered the truffle Mac & Cheese
column4: 1/2 pound of chilled King Crab Legs
column5: Dry Aged Bone in NY Strip & lastly the Chocolate Cream Pie. All we're soooo delicious
column6: we don't usually take pics of our food
